chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor
chapter.para: Short Message Peer-to-Peer (SMPP) in the telecommunications industry is an open, industry standard protocol designed to provide a flexible data communication interface for the transfer of short message data between External Short Messaging Entities (ESMEs), Routing Entities (REs) and Message Centres.
For further details please look at specs
This resource adaptor provides a SMPP API for JAIN SLEE applications, adapting the SMPP specification.
